import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import api from "../../services/api"; import Header from "../header/header"; import Footer from "../footer/Footer"; import "./Product.css"; const Product = () => { const { productId } = useParams(); // Get product ID from URL const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { const fetchProductDetails = async () => { try { const response = await api.get(`/products/${productId}`); setProduct(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching product details:", error); alert("Failed to load product details."); } }; fetchProductDetails(); }, [productId]); const addToCart = async () => { try { await api.post("/cart", { productId, quantity: 1 }); alert("Product added to cart!"); } catch (error) { console.error("Error adding to cart:", error); alert("Failed to add product to cart."); } }; if (!product) { return
